text: Chicago Tonight is a television news program broadcast weeknights on WTTW in Chicago. "Chicago Tonight" reports on local politics, education, business, culture, science and health, with a mix of in-studio panel discussions, one- on-one interviews and short documentary-style packages based in Chicago or the state of Illinois. Phil Ponce is the current host. The show first aired April 24, 1984 and was hosted by popular Chicago broadcast journalist John Callaway for 15 years. He continued to contribute to the show until his death in 2009. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1984 American television series debuts Category:Television series set in Chicago Category:American television news programs Category:1980s establishments in Illinois
